TextView.android:text: This application, Quadratic assistant was created to help you convert quadratic equations, including all the three forms, Vertex, Factored and Standard.You should be able to convert back and forth very easily without any trouble. The formulas for the equations are as followed vertex is :y=a(x-h)²+k, Factored form is :(a-x) (b-x), Standard form is :ax²+bx+c. ,
